text: This is a list of islands that are part of Greece. They are shown in order of size. Rank by size Island name Area (kmÂ²) 1 Crete 8.336 2 Euboea 3.655 3 Lesbos 1.630 4 Rhodes 1.398 5 Chios 842 6 Kefalonia 781 7 Corfu 593 8 Samos 477 9 Limnos 476 10 Naxos 428 11 Zakynthos 402 12 Andros 380 13 Thasos 379 14 Lefkada 303 15 Karpathos 301 16 Kos 290 17 Kithira 278 18 Ikaria 255 19 Skyros 209 20 Paros 195 21 Tinos 194 22 Samothrace 178 23 Milos 150 24 Kea 130 25 Amorgos 121 26 Kalymnos 111 27 Ios 106 28 Kythnos 100 29 Astypalaia 97 30 Ithaca 96 31 Skopelos 95 32 Salamis 95 33 Mykonos 85 34 Syros 84 35 Aegina 83 36 Thira (Santorini) 76 37 Serifos 73 38 Sifnos 73 39 Kasos 66 40 Alonnisos 64 * islands
title: List of Greek islands
